nl.esciencecenter.esight.models

Class Model

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.esciencecenter.esight.models.Model
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Axis, Box, GeoSphere, GeoSphereCut, Line, MultiColorText, Quad, Sphere

    public abstract class Model
extends java.lang.Object
    General extendible class representing a model with a VBO.
    Author:
    Maarten van Meersbergen

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Model.vertex_format
      The OpenGL-internal vertex format rules the vertexes in the VBO can follow.

        public int getNumVertices()

      • draw

        public void draw(javax.media.opengl.GL3 gl,
        ShaderProgram program)
        Draw method for this model. Links its VBO attributes and calls OpenGL DrawArrays.
        Parameters:
        gl - The global openGL instance.
        program - The shader program to be used for this drawing instance.
